channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-22784] Boundary condition to check if there is nothing to truncate in StringExpr functions
item.description:
Add a boundary condition to check if there is nothing to truncate in StringExpr functions

truncate()

rightTrimAndTruncate()
item.summary: Boundary condition to check if there is nothing to truncate in StringExpr functions

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
